Headline: Yellow Line Service Temporarily Suspended
ShortDescription: Service on the Yellow Line continues to be temporarily suspended following an incident at Howard.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Yellow Line continues to be temporarily suspended following a recent incident at Howard.

Shuttle bus service is available between Howard and Skokie/Dempster, serving all affected stations during normal hours of operation.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include the #97 Skokie bus route.

We are working to restore service as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Reroute at Damen/Fulton
ShortDescription: 50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Damen, Grand, Ashland, Madison and Damen due to street blockage near Damen/Fulton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect  my trip?

#50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Damen, Grand, Ashland, Madison and Damen due to street blockage near Damen/Fulton.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #152 Addison Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Addison/Austin
ShortDescription: Eastbound 152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted via Addison, Austin, Irving Park, Central and Addison: due to, street blockage near Addison/Austin.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound 1#52 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted via Addison, Austin, Irving Park, Central and Addison: due to, street blockage near Addison/Austin.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #94 California Temporary Southbound Reroute near California/Milwaukee
ShortDescription: SB 94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via California, Fullerton, Sacramento, Armitage & California: due to, street blockage near California/Milwaukee.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via California, Fullerton, Sacramento, Armitage and California: due to, street blockage near California/Milwaukee.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier police activity at LaSalle. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier police activity at LaSalle.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
